dialog.speaker: Gaston the Great Trader of Magical Oddities
dialog.content: Come one, come all! Come and see what the Great Gaston has brought to you from the far reaches of creation. Priceless treasures that will turn the heads of even the richest of kings and the most traveled adventurers! Magical items to improve your abilities! Potions to win the heart of the one you love! And incantation that will spin the strands of fate in your favor!
parts: 'Come one, come all! Come and see what the Great Gaston has brought to you from the far reaches of creation. Priceless treasures that will turn the heads of even the richest of kings and the most traveled adventurers! Magical items to improve your abilities! Potions to win the heart of the one you love! And incantation that will spin the strands of fate in your favor! '

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: Quiet a promise coming from no more than a common peasant.
parts: 'Quiet a promise coming from no more than a common peasant.'

dialog.speaker: Gaston the Great Trader of Magical Oddities
dialog.content: I am no more a common peasant that you are the Sultan.
parts: 'I am no more a common peasant that you are the Sultan.'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: Indeed, but I suppose it would interest you to know then, that I, as Vizier to the Sultan, have his ear. And I have no doubt that he would find your sale of these heretical items to be. . . unfortunate.
parts: 'Indeed, but I suppose it would interest you to know then, that I, as Vizier to the Sultan, have his ear. And I have no doubt that he would find your sale of these heretical items to be. . . unfortunate.'

dialog.speaker: Gaston the Great Trader of Magical Oddities
dialog.content: My Lord forgive my transgression! I am as you say no more than a common peasant not worthy of your mercy but I beg you sire, please show kindness!
parts: 'My Lord forgive my transgression! I am as you say no more than a common peasant not worthy of your mercy but I beg you sire, please show kindness!'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: Mercy is a fools game. Your punishment will be swift.
parts: 'Mercy is a fools game. Your punishment will be swift.'

dialog.speaker: Gaston the Great Trader of Magical Oddities
dialog.content: No my Lord! Not the dungeon please do not take me there!
parts: 'No my Lord! Not the dungeon please do not take me there!'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: Your groveling is disgusting. Pick yourself up off the street and be gone from my sight, if I ever find your peddling your filth again I will not be as forgiving.
parts: 'Your groveling is disgusting. Pick yourself up off the street and be gone from my sight, if I ever find your peddling your filth again I will not be as forgiving.'

dialog.speaker: Gaston the Great Trader of Magical Oddities
dialog.content: Thank you sire, I shall never trouble you again.
parts: 'Thank you sire, I shall never trouble you again.'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: Normally, I would send you to the dungeon without a second thought. Fortunately for you however, you may be of use to me.
parts: 'Normally, I would send you to the dungeon without a second thought. Fortunately for you however, you may be of use to me.'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: What do you know of the mercenary Barnes?
parts: 'What do you know of the mercenary Barnes?'

dialog.speaker: Gaston the Great Trader of Magical Oddities
dialog.content: Barnes puts on a show for the people. They think he is so strong and fearless, but Gaston the Great knows better. Barnes came to me one day asking for a talisman to ward of serpents. For all his muscle he is still terrified of a simple snake.
parts: 'Barnes puts on a show for the people. They think he is so strong and fearless, but Gaston the Great knows better. Barnes came to me one day asking for a talisman to ward of serpents. For all his muscle he is still terrified of a simple snake.'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: What do you know of the traveler Hidalgo?
parts: 'What do you know of the traveler Hidalgo?'

dialog.speaker: Gaston the Great Trader of Magical Oddities
dialog.content: Little do I know of Hidalgo, but I have encountered others like him in my own travels. His is a disciple of the Order, an ancient cult of strange magic. The Order has caused Gaston the Great many a difficulty in the past.
parts: 'Little do I know of Hidalgo, but I have encountered others like him in my own travels. His is a disciple of the Order, an ancient cult of strange magic. The Order has caused Gaston the Great many a difficulty in the past.'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: There is an odd atmosphere around Julius, what do you know of him?
parts: 'There is an odd atmosphere around Julius, what do you know of him?'

dialog.speaker: Gaston the Great Trader of Magical Oddities
dialog.content: Old Julius is said to have been the only survivor of a terrible battle. He never said where he came from or who, or what, he was fighting or why. Quite the mysterious figure that one.
parts: 'Old Julius is said to have been the only survivor of a terrible battle. He never said where he came from or who, or what, he was fighting or why. Quite the mysterious figure that one.'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: What can you tell me about the widow Makma?
parts: 'What can you tell me about the widow Makma?'

dialog.speaker: Gaston the Great Trader of Magical Oddities
dialog.content: Rumor has it, that she killed her husband have he took a second woman. The guards could never prove it but like to make her life miserable all the same.
parts: 'Rumor has it, that she killed her husband have he took a second woman. The guards could never prove it but like to make her life miserable all the same.'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: With an introduction like that how can I resist looking at what you have to offer?
parts: 'With an introduction like that how can I resist looking at what you have to offer?'

dialog.speaker: Gaston the Great Trader of Magical Oddities
dialog.content: You will not be disappointed.
parts: 'You will not be disappointed.'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: I wish to peruse your items.
parts: 'I wish to peruse your items.'

dialog.speaker: Gaston the Great Trader of Magical Oddities
dialog.content: Mighty hypocritical of you my Lord but . . . how can I refuse?
parts: 'Mighty hypocritical of you my Lord but . . . how can I refuse?'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: I will take my leave.
parts: 'I will take my leave.'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: Greetings Barnes, your reputation as a warrior has reached me.
parts: 'Greetings Barnes, your reputation as a warrior has reached me.'

dialog.speaker: Barnes
dialog.content: Ah who you? You want Barnes crush enemy? Or you just want waste Barnes time.
parts: 'Ah who you? You want Barnes crush enemy? Or you just want waste Barnes time.'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: I wish to hire you
parts: 'I wish to hire you'

dialog.speaker: Barnes
dialog.content: You want Barnes crush bad guy?
parts: 'You want Barnes crush bad guy?'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: . . . Yes I want you to crush a bad guy.
parts: '. . . Yes I want you to crush a bad guy.'

dialog.speaker: Barnes
dialog.content: Yay! Barnes loves crush bad guy.
parts: 'Yay! Barnes loves crush bad guy.'

rules.name: Rule Barnes Snakes
rules.displayAs: I heard you were terrified of snakes

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: I heard a rumor that the mighty Barnes was terrified of snakes. . .
parts: 'I heard a rumor that the mighty Barnes was terrified of snakes. . .'

dialog.speaker: Barnes
dialog.content: Snakes! Snakes! No snakes! Barnes no like slithery slimy snakeys!
parts: 'Snakes! Snakes! No snakes! Barnes no like slithery slimy snakeys!'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: Greetings Hidalgo, what brings you to the Great city of Mendacium?
parts: 'Greetings Hidalgo, what brings you to the Great city of Mendacium?'

dialog.speaker: Hidalgo
dialog.content: Travel brings me closer to God my Lord and Mendarium holds within it such wonders.
parts: 'Travel brings me closer to God my Lord and Mendarium holds within it such wonders.'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: Do not mistake whom you speak to Hidalgo, tell me the real reason you are here.
parts: 'Do not mistake whom you speak to Hidalgo, tell me the real reason you are here.'

dialog.speaker: Hidalgo
dialog.content: I am afraid I do not understand your meaning.
parts: 'I am afraid I do not understand your meaning.'

rules.name: Rule Hidalgo Order
rules.displayAs: I know you are here for the Order

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: There is no need for secrecy Hidalgo, I know you to be a disciple of the Order.
parts: 'There is no need for secrecy Hidalgo, I know you to be a disciple of the Order.'

dialog.speaker: Hidalgo
dialog.content: The Order is powerful my Lord, I would be carful of any who was really connected to them.
parts: 'The Order is powerful my Lord, I would be carful of any who was really connected to them.'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: Fear not, I am not here to take you in. Your Orders ways has always interest me. Perhaps there is a way that we could work together. . .
parts: 'Fear not, I am not here to take you in. Your Orders ways has always interest me. Perhaps there is a way that we could work together. . .'

dialog.speaker: Hidalgo
dialog.content: Indeed. Perhaps we can. If you are truly interested in working together then you could prove it to me by obtained three objects from the citizens within this very market
parts: 'Indeed. Perhaps we can. If you are truly interested in working together then you could prove it to me by obtained three objects from the citizens within this very market'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: What are these three objects?
parts: 'What are these three objects?'

dialog.speaker: Hidalgo
dialog.content: First is the Scepter of Anuh, held by the widow Makma. Second, the Stone of Jordan which is possessed by Gaston. And last, the Windseekers Bindings currently in the hands of the soldier Julius.
parts: 'First is the Scepter of Anuh, held by the widow Makma. Second, the Stone of Jordan which is possessed by Gaston. And last, the Windseekers Bindings currently in the hands of the soldier Julius.'

rules.name: Rule Hidalgo Scepter of Anuh
rules.displayAs: I have the Scepter of Anuh

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: Here is the Scepter of Anuh, Makma was loathed to relinquish it.
parts: 'Here is the Scepter of Anuh, Makma was loathed to relinquish it.'

dialog.speaker: Hidalgo
dialog.content: Ah thank you my friend long have I sought this scepter. I will put it to good use.
parts: 'Ah thank you my friend long have I sought this scepter. I will put it to good use.'

rules.name: Rule Hidalgo Stone of Jordan
rules.displayAs: I have the Stone of Jordan

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: Here is the Stone of Jordan, whatever it is it better be worth the price I had to pay Gaston for it.
parts: 'Here is the Stone of Jordan, whatever it is it better be worth the price I had to pay Gaston for it.'

dialog.speaker: Hidalgo
dialog.content: My friend, this is marvelous indeed! Long has Gaston kept the Stone from me.
parts: 'My friend, this is marvelous indeed! Long has Gaston kept the Stone from me.'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: I have the Windseekers Bindings, Julius seemed almost relieved to relinquish it to me.
parts: 'I have the Windseekers Bindings, Julius seemed almost relieved to relinquish it to me.'

dialog.speaker: Hidalgo
dialog.content: Fantastic tidings my friend! Julius has long distrusted me and denied me the Bindings that are the rightful property of the Order.
parts: 'Fantastic tidings my friend! Julius has long distrusted me and denied me the Bindings that are the rightful property of the Order.'

rules.name: Rule Hidalgo Staff of Jordan Items
rules.displayAs: Why do you require these items

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: I have retrieved two of the three items you desire. Surely I have proven myself worthy of at least some additional information.
parts: 'I have retrieved two of the three items you desire. Surely I have proven myself worthy of at least some additional information.'

dialog.speaker: Hidalgo
dialog.content: Yes of course my friend, you have proven yourself true to me. My masters at the Order has conscripted me to assemble the Staff of Jordan, as luck would have it, three of the four pieces are in this very market.
parts: 'Yes of course my friend, you have proven yourself true to me. My masters at the Order has conscripted me to assemble the Staff of Jordan, as luck would have it, three of the four pieces are in this very market.'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: And the forth piece?
parts: 'And the forth piece?'

dialog.speaker: Hidalgo
dialog.content: Patience, friend you may be but member of the Order you are not. I cannot reveal my organizations secrets to such a new acquaintance.
parts: 'Patience, friend you may be but member of the Order you are not. I cannot reveal my organizations secrets to such a new acquaintance.'

rules.name: Rule Hidalgo Staff of Jordan Items
rules.displayAs: You have all of the items you wished for

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: I have done what you have asked, now tell me what it was all for.
parts: 'I have done what you have asked, now tell me what it was all for.'

dialog.speaker: Hidalgo
dialog.content: Indeed you have my friend. Very well I shall tell you what I wish to know. These are three of the four items that combined will recreate the Staff of Jordan, a weapon of unimaginable magical potency. My masters at the Order wish me to reassemble the staff and bring it back to them.
parts: 'Indeed you have my friend. Very well I shall tell you what I wish to know. These are three of the four items that combined will recreate the Staff of Jordan, a weapon of unimaginable magical potency. My masters at the Order wish me to reassemble the staff and bring it back to them.'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: And where is this forth piece?
parts: 'And where is this forth piece?'

dialog.speaker: Hidalgo
dialog.content: The Blood of Jordan, I am not sure except that it is in this city somewhere. The ancient mage Jordan was known to have died in the dungeons of the Sultans palace but I am unable to access them.
parts: 'The Blood of Jordan, I am not sure except that it is in this city somewhere. The ancient mage Jordan was known to have died in the dungeons of the Sultans palace but I am unable to access them.'

rules.name: Rule Blood of Jordan Dungeon Access
rules.displayAs: I can grant you access the palace dungeons

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: You are in luck my friend, as Vizier to the Sultan I can grant you access to the palace dungeons.
parts: 'You are in luck my friend, as Vizier to the Sultan I can grant you access to the palace dungeons.'

dialog.speaker: Hidalgo
dialog.content: Such fortune it was that the fates aligned in out meeting this day! Should we find the Blood of Jordan I am sure that my masters will accept you into the Order.
parts: 'Such fortune it was that the fates aligned in out meeting this day! Should we find the Blood of Jordan I am sure that my masters will accept you into the Order.'

rules.name: Rule Blood of Jordan No Dungeon Access
rules.displayAs: The palace dungeons are impossible breach

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: How unfortunate, the palace dungeons are guarded almost as heavily as the Sultans chambers. We will never make it in.
parts: 'How unfortunate, the palace dungeons are guarded almost as heavily as the Sultans chambers. We will never make it in.'

dialog.speaker: Hidalgo
dialog.content: The odds are not in our favor, but I cannot give up. I will continue to search for ways in, come back to me if you find anything.
parts: 'The odds are not in our favor, but I cannot give up. I will continue to search for ways in, come back to me if you find anything.'

rules.name: Rule Blood of Jordan Dungeon Access

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: You will have to forgive my dishonesty, I am in fact a Vizier to the Sultan and can grant you access to the palace dungeons.
parts: 'You will have to forgive my dishonesty, I am in fact a Vizier to the Sultan and can grant you access to the palace dungeons.'

dialog.speaker: Hidalgo
dialog.content: A Vizier to the Sultan? And you wish to assist me still? Why did you not mention this earlier?
parts: 'A Vizier to the Sultan? And you wish to assist me still? Why did you not mention this earlier?'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: A man in my position stands to lose much if It becomes known that I am associating with the Order.
parts: 'A man in my position stands to lose much if It becomes known that I am associating with the Order.'

dialog.speaker: Hidalgo
dialog.content: I see, yet you conviction to our cause has won over fear. Perhaps there is still room for you within the ranks of the Order.
parts: 'I see, yet you conviction to our cause has won over fear. Perhaps there is still room for you within the ranks of the Order.'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: Greeting Julius
parts: 'Greeting Julius'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: I have heard that you survived a great battle. What happened? Who were you fighting?
parts: 'I have heard that you survived a great battle. What happened? Who were you fighting?'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: Solider, I command you to answer me, as Vizier to the Sultan you will tell me what I wish to know!
parts: 'Solider, I command you to answer me, as Vizier to the Sultan you will tell me what I wish to know!'

dialog.speaker: Julius
dialog.content: I stopped listening to order a long time ago. If you want to through me in the dungeon for it, be my guest. If not then you are standing in my sunlight.
parts: 'I stopped listening to order a long time ago. If you want to through me in the dungeon for it, be my guest. If not then you are standing in my sunlight.'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: Who were you fighting for?
parts: 'Who were you fighting for?'

dialog.speaker: Julius
dialog.content: I fought for a kingdom long lost to the sands.
parts: 'I fought for a kingdom long lost to the sands.'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: Very well soldier, I will not trouble you anymore.
parts: 'Very well soldier, I will not trouble you anymore.'

rules.name: Rule Julius Old Kingdom
rules.displayAs: What was this old kingdom you speak of

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: This old kingdom you speak of? What was it? When was it?
parts: 'This old kingdom you speak of? What was it? When was it?'

dialog.speaker: Julius
dialog.content: Jericho, a perfect land filled with perfect people. Until the scourge came and took it from us. All I have left of it is this scrap of cloth from the armor of our greatest champion.
parts: 'Jericho, a perfect land filled with perfect people. Until the scourge came and took it from us. All I have left of it is this scrap of cloth from the armor of our greatest champion.'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: You have been haunted by you past for too long. Give me the cloth and let go of your misery and guilt.
parts: 'You have been haunted by you past for too long. Give me the cloth and let go of your misery and guilt.'

dialog.speaker: Julius
dialog.content: Yes, I think it is time to let go of the past. You will take it from me, take it for me. My only request is that you guard it carefully, there are those who would seek such an artifact for defiant means.
parts: 'Yes, I think it is time to let go of the past. You will take it from me, take it for me. My only request is that you guard it carefully, there are those who would seek such an artifact for defiant means.'

dialog.speaker: Jafar
dialog.content: You have my word Julius, I will keep it safe.
parts: 'You have my word Julius, I will keep it safe.'

dialog.speaker: Julius
dialog.content: Then I am relieved. Thank you stranger, you have shown me a great kindness this day.
parts: 'Then I am relieved. Thank you stranger, you have shown me a great kindness this day.'
